A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: There are good parts to this movie.  This is by no means as good or even close to The Empire Strikes Back\, don't let anyone tell you that.  I'm tired of the corny dialog... admiral whateverhername was said \"Godspeed\" really? thats the best you could write?  Who the f is writing these screenplays????... and there were a couple of things in this movie that are just ridiculous... even for a fantasy movie.  I thought Luke's treatment in this screenplay was pretty good.  Kylo and Rey dynamic was good.  It was better than The Force Awakens\, at least it took some risks.
